modName: Meridia's Secret Weapon - Two Handed Dawnbreaker
summary:
This mod adds a two handed dawnbreaker to the game as an alternative to the one handed dawnbreaker that meridia gives you.
[Features]
-Working blood mesh
-Working Two hand weapon (Is on back and has 2 handed animations)
-Same enchantment as 1 handed dawnbreaker
-3x more powerful than 1 handed dawnbreaker
-Weight
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][color=red]2 Handed Dawnbreaker
[/color][/size][/b]This Is a complete new mesh and weapon It doesnt replace the vanilla Dawnbreaker
[color=yellow]Check out the sticky comment I posted in the comments thats whats comming next for this mod[/color]

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Mod Name][/size][/color]
2 Handed Dawnbreaker

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Initial Release Version][/size][/color]
1.0

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Initial Release Date][/size][/color]
11/5/2014

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Current Version][/size][/color]
1.1

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Current Version Release Date][/size][/color]
11/7/2014

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Description][/size][/color]
This mod adds a two handed dawnbreaker to the game as an alternative to the one handed dawnbreaker that meridia gives you.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]{Features} [/size][/color]
-Working blood mesh
-Working Two hand weapon (Is on back and has 2 handed animations)
-Same enchantment as 1 handed dawnbreaker
-3x more powerful than 1 handed dawnbreaker
-Weight of 20 (2x the weight of the 1 handed dawnbreaker)
-Upgradeable (with same materials as the 1 handed dawnbreaker)

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Installation][/size][/color]
-Use NMM or Copy the TwoHandedDawnbreaker.esp and TwoHandedDawnbreaker.bsa to your skyrim Data Directory

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Un-Installation][/size][/color]
-Use NMM or delete the TwoHandedDawnbreaker.esp and TwoHandedDawnbreaker.bsa from your skyrim Data Directory

[color=#ff7700][size=4][Change Log][/size][/color]
[size=2][Version 1.0]
-Initial Release
[Version 1.1]
-Fixed stagger value to 1.0 instead of .75
-Released a reduced stat version[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=4][How to get in game][/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]{Requirements}[/size][/color]
- Quest "The break of dawn" must be completed
- Must have dawnbreaker in your characters inventory

Go to the dwemer button pedastal next to meridias shrine activate it and select "Replace with 2 handed version" the script will then remove your one handed dawnbreaker and give you a two handed version.


[color=#ffff00][size=3][center][color=#ff7700][size=5][Videos][/size][/color][/center]
